thread.section_title: MyGiftCardSupply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyGiftCardSupply | mygiftcardsupply.com
thread.title: Vanessa Muegge

author: Vanessa Muegge
title: Vanessa Muegge
text: I still don't understand why they want us to provide a copy of the ID for verification since I have previously done many online purchases without such thing (and way higher prices). I received very fast responses on the homepage chat thing bottom right of the page and the person was very helpful in answering my questions and helping me with the verification after a few problems I had with my computer not cooperating. Finally got the Code and instantly redeemed it just incase. The first time process is a bit tedious with providing the ID but overall I am very happy with the customer support and the product!!! Finally found a secure place to place orders for gift cards :) Recommendable!
